properties.address: 3 Market Square Buildings, Stonehaven, United Kingdom, AB39 2BY
properties.description: What started as a children’s yoga class in Stonehaven has grown to a community wellbeing space with a fully equipped yoga studio, healing room and mindful room with 25 people working from The Haven offering 45 wellbeing activities weekly. However the recent pandemic has seen us transform the yoga studio into a community larder to help those most vulnerable in the area. The service gives members of the public access to food and toiletries with no questions asked. Programs & Events Timetable - The Haven Facebook: The Haven in Stonehaven
properties.title: The Haven in Stonehaven - Community Larder & Wellbeing Space
